ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Input on Recent digest Topics
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh...well, I don t have a group yet...just trying to think ahead...be prepared, I always say! So the bard water breath song is a luxury, and whoever has it
ygData.messageBody:
Heh...well, I don't have a group yet...just trying to think ahead...be
prepared, I always say!

So the bard water breath song is a luxury, and whoever has it should have
enduring breath ready? BTW, where the heck do you get the fish scales for
enduring breath? I think I'll carry a supply when I go...just cause I'm a
nice guy...heh.

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 10:28 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Input on Recent digest Topics


Heh they shouldnt depend on you... What group do you have with no water
breath spell? I'd reccomend potions if thats the case...
